problem_text_cn: 如图,AP为圆O的切线,P为切点,OA交圆O于点B,若∠A=40°,则∠APB等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AP is the tangent of circle O, P is the tangent point, OA intersects circle O at point B, if ∠A = N_0, then ∠APB is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接OP,∵AP为圆O的切线,P为切点,∴∠OPA=90°,∴∠O=90°-∠A=50°,∵OB=OP,∴∠OPB=∠OBP=(180°-∠O)÷2=65°,∴∠APB=90°-∠OPB=25°．故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题利用了切线的性质,直角三角形的性质,等边对等角,三角形内角和定理求解,综合性比较强．
